name: California Children's Services (CCS)
description: CCS is a statewide program that serves children and youth under 21 years old with certain medical conditions. - Medical case management to help children with certain conditions get medical care. - The Medical Therapy Program (MTP), which provides physical therapy (PT) and occupational therapy (OT)

howToGetIt: - Your doctor may send in a referral - You may also fill out the CCS application (English CCS application/Spanish CCS application) yourself and send it to our office, by fax, by mail, or in person. Address: California Children's Services, 333 Valencia Street 4th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103, Fax: (628) 217-6701 - You may also call (628) 217-6700 for more information.
